subject: World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The question of how players and fans will cope with the heat in Qatar in 2022 won't go away. One solution would be to move it to winter and let clubs decide which players will be freed to play.
snippet: The question of how players and fans will cope with the heat in Qatar in 2022 won't go away. One solution would be to move it to winter and let clubs decide which players will be freed to play.
